title.narrative: 3.3 MULTISECTORAL APPROACHES ADRESSING OUT OF SCHOOL

description.narrative: 3.3 Innovative multisectoral and flexible approaches that address the needs and rights of boys and girls who are in school and adolescents who are not in school, employed or in training are tested, evaluated and advocated for scale-up, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: In 2025, education, health and protection systems are resilient, ensure equitable and quality access and promote the effective, inclusive, participation of children and their families

INSPECTION GENERALE DE LA PEDAGOGIE DE L EDUCATION

Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

related-activity.ref: 4320/A0/05/883 3. EFFECTIVE EDUCATION, HEALTH AND PROTECTION SYSTEMS

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.3 Innovative multisectoral and flexible approaches that address the needs and rights of boys and girls who are in school andadolescents who are not in school, employed or in training are tested, evaluated and advocated for scale-up

description.narrative: Testing of models to prevent and respond to school drop-out has continue to progress in 2021. The 1st public Second Chance centre was inaugurated in Tunis in April by the Head of Government and four ministries; and more than 1,600 adolescents - 800 in 2nd chance centres and 850 in 9 pilot schools – benefited from orientation, catch-up education, psychosocial support to continue their learning, with 1,500 more participating in extracurricular activities supporting life skills development. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/12/2021
